trans-unit.source: Specifies values that indicates whether data should be encrypted or decrypted, whether a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended or validated, or both.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于指明是否加密或解密数据，是否应追加或验证，因此基于哈希的消息身份验证代码 (HMAC) 或两者的值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended to the data and that the data should be encrypted (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method) or that the data should be both decrypted and validated (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 指定应将基于哈希的消息身份验证代码 (HMAC) 追加到数据，并且应加密数据 (有关<xref:System.Web.Security.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法) 或数据应同时进行解密和验证 (有关<xref:System.Web.Security.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the data should be encrypted (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method) or decrypted (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 指定应加密数据 (有关<xref:System.Web.Security.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法) 或解密 (有关<xref:System.Web.Security.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended to the data (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method) or validated (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 指定应将基于哈希的消息身份验证代码 (HMAC) 追加到数据 (有关<xref:System.Web.Security.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法) 或验证 (有关<xref:System.Web.Security.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法)。
